thread.title: BRIEF-Terraform Power Files For Offering Of Up To $400 Million In Class A Common Stock - SEC Filing

title: BRIEF-Terraform Power Files For Offering Of Up To $400 Million In Class A Common Stock - SEC Filing
text: 47 AM / Updated 13 minutes ago BRIEF-Terraform Power Files For Offering Of Up To $400 Million In Class A Common Stock - SEC Filing Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 19 (Reuters) - Terraform Power Inc: * TERRAFORM POWER FILES FOR OFFERING OF UP TO $400 MILLION IN CLASS A COMMON STOCK - SEC FILING * TERRAFORM POWER - AFFILIATE OF BROOKFIELD CURRENTLY OWNS ABOUT 51% INTEREST IN CO * TERRAFORM POWER - A BROOKFIELD ENTITY WILL BUY A NUMBER OF SHARES OF CLASS A COMMON STOCK EQUAL TO AT LEAST 51% OF TOTAL SHARES SOLD IN OFFERING‍​‍​ * TERRAFORM POWER - FOLLOWING OFFERING & ANY CONCURRENT PRIVATE PLACEMENT, BROOKFIELD, AFFILIATES EXPECTED TO OWN AT LEAST 51% OF CLASS A SHARES IN CO‍​‍​ Source text ( bit.ly/2poTkhM ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
